@description.body:
*****************************************************************

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2004-2009 1&1 Internet AG, Germany, http://www.1und1.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Martin Wittemann (martinwittemann) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The radio container handles a collection of items from which only one item can be selected. Selection another item will deselect the previously selected item. For that, it uses the {@link qx.ui.form.RadioGroup} object. This class is used to create radio groups of {@link qx.ui.form.RadioButton} instances. This widget takes care of the layout of the added items. If you want to take full control of the layout and just use the selection behavior, take a look at the {@link qx.ui.form.RadioGroup} object for a loose coupling.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: layout {qx.ui.layout.Abstract} The new layout or null to reset the layout.
@param.description: The new layout or null to reset the layout.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flag signaling if the group at all is valid. All children will have the same state.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flag signaling if the group is required.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Message which is shown in an invalid tooltip.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Message which is shown in an invalid tooltip if the {@link #required} is set to true.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fires after the value was modified

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fires after the selection was modified

@description.body: property apply

@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The internally used radio group instance will be returned.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the children list

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds a new child widget. The supported keys of the layout options map depend on the layout used to position the widget. The options are documented in the class documentation of each layout manager {@link qx.ui.layout}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Remove the given child widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Remove all children.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an array of currently selected items. Note: The result is only a set of selected items, so the order can differ from the sequence in which the items were added.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Replaces current selection with the given items.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} if the item is not a child element.
@throws.description: if the item is not a child element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Clears the whole selection at once.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Detects whether the given item is currently selected.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} if the item is not a child element.
@throws.description: if the item is not a child element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the selection is empty.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns all elements which are selectable.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
all {Boolean} true for all selectables, false for the
   selectables the user can interactively select
@param.description:
true for all selectables, false for the
   selectables the user can interactively select

@param.description: Item to set as selected value.

@description.body: Reset radio item selection.

@param.body: event {qx.event.type.Data} Event containing the {@link qx.ui.form.RadioGroup} selection data.
@param.description: Event containing the {@link qx.ui.form.RadioGroup} selection data.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set a layout manager for the widget. A a layout manager can only be connected with one widget. Reset the connection with a previous widget first, if you like to use it in another widget instead.
